text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, ʙarpodorandai adolat ʙosed [va] ʙaroi Alloh taolo sahodat dihed, agarci ʙa zijoni xudaton jo padaru modar va nazdikon [-i sumo] ʙosad. Agar [jake az du tarafi da'vo] tavongar jo nijozmand ʙosad, [ʙoz ham] Alloh taolo [az sumo] ʙa on du nafar sazovortar ast, pas, az havoi nafs pajravi nakuned, ki [az haq] munharif mesaved. Va agar zaʙonro ʙigardoned, [va haqro tahrif kuned] jo [az izhori on] xuddori namoed, musallaman, Alloh taolo ʙa on ci ancom medihed, ogoh ast
